name: Wonder Man
text: Power Recycling — Wonder Man recibe +1 ATQ for each card tucked under Ionic Physiology. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Wonder Man makes a basic attack, discard each card tucked under Ionic Physiology.

name: Simon Williams
text: Ionic Energy Being — You may include events with a printed [energy] resource icon from any aspect in a tu deck. Preparación: Put Ionic Physiology into play.

name: Ionic Physiology
text: Permanent. Max 3 cards tucked here. Response: After you play an event with a printed [energy] resource, tuck that event from a tu discard pile under this card → heal 1 de Daño from a tu identity.

name: Active Altruism
text: Acción de Héroe (thwart): Remove 1 de Amenaza from a scheme. Remove 2 additional de Amenaza from that scheme for each [energy] resource you overpaid for this card (to a maximum of [energy] [energy]).

name: Ionic Blast
text: Acción de Héroe (attack): inflige 3 de Daño to an enemy. inflige 2 additional de Daño to that enemy for each [energy] resource you overpaid for this card (to a maximum of [energy] [energy] [energy]).

name: Starstruck
text: Acción de Héroe (attack): inflige de Daño to an enemy equal a tu ATQ. si you overpaid for this card with a [energy] resource, aturde that enemy.

name: Energy Siphon
text: Interrupción de Héroe: cuando you spend this card, take up to 3 de Daño → this card generates 1 additional [energy] resource for each de Daño taken de este modo.

name: Wonder Fans
text: Acción de Alter ego: Exhaust Wonder Fans → choose: • Tuck 1 event with a printed [energy] resource from a tu discard pile under Ionic Physiology. • Draw 1 card.

name: Jet Belt
text: Héroe Resource: Exhaust Jet Belt → generate a [energy] resource for an event. Héroe Resource: Exhaust Jet Belt y discard a card tucked under Ionic Physiology → generate a [energy] resource.

flavor: "Hey, aren't you one of those guys from Beach Volleyball Bros Part II?" —Kate Bishop
name: Mr. Hollywood
text: Resource: Generate a [energy] resource to overpay for a card. (Limit once per card.)

name: Signature Sunglasses
text: Response: After cambies de identidad, choose: • Tuck an event o resource card with a printed [energy] resource from a tu discard pile under Ionic Physiology. • Add a card tucked under Ionic Physiology a tu hand.

name: "What Are You?"
text: Interrupción obligada: cuando Wonder Man would be defeated, instead set his hit point dial to 4 y change him to alter-ego form. You may tuck events with a printed [energy] resource from a tu discard pile under Ionic Physiology until there are 3 cards tucked there. Remove this card desde el game.

name: Firebird
text: si you overpaid for Firebird, put 1 rebirth counter on her. Interrupción: cuando Firebird would be defeated by consequential de Daño, quita 1 rebirth counter from her → heal all de Daño from her instead.

name: Hawkeye
text: Hawkeye enters play with 4 arrow counters on him. Response: After an ally makes a basic thwart, quita 1 arrow counter from Hawkeye → inflige 2 de Daño to a Esbirro.

name: Scarlet Witch
text: Respuesta obligada: After you play Scarlet Witch, discard las card of the encounter deck. si it is a treachery card, resolve its "Cuando se muestre esta carta" ability.

name: Sentry
text: Respuesta obligada: After Sentry enters play, search the encounter deck for a side scheme y reveal it. (Shuffle.) si no side scheme was mostrado de este modo, place 6 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal.

name: Battlefield Benevolence
text: Acción de Héroe: Heal 2 de Daño from an enemy → confuse that enemy.

name: Everywhere All at Once
text: Play only if a tu identity has the [[Aéreo]] trait. Acción de Héroe (thwart): Choose X schemes. Remove 2 de Amenaza from each chosen scheme (3 de Amenaza instead if you overpaid for this card).

name: Stronger Together
text: Interrupción de Héroe: cuando a character other than a tu hero vaya a sufrir cualquier cantidad de Daño, if that character shares a [[Trait]] with a tu hero, reduce that de Daño by a tu DEF.

name: Unified Strike
text: Interrupción de Héroe: cuando an ally uses a basic power, exhaust a tu hero → add a tu hero's matching power to that ally's power for this use. That ally does not take consequential de Daño for this use.

name: Heroic Conditioning
text:
Play under any jugador's control. Max 1 per jugador.
You get +3 de Vida y a tu hero recibe +1 THW.

name: Swordsman
text: [star] Swordsman's basic ataca ganan Penetrante. Respuesta de Héroe: After a boost card is turned faceup during an undefended attack, declare Swordsman as the defender without exhausting him.

name: Jarvis
text: Response: After an [[Vengador]] hero changes into alter-ego form, exhaust Jarvis → choose: • That identity recibe +2 REC until the end of the phase. • Discard a status card from that identity.

name: Caught in the Crossfire
text: Vincula esta carta a a non-[[Élite]] Esbirro. Max 1 per Esbirro. Interrupción: cuando a friendly character ataca, inflige 1 de Daño to attached Esbirro.

name: Cameo
text: Preparación. Max 1 per deck. Preparación: Search a tu collection for an identity-specific ally for an identity not in this game. Shuffle that ally into a tu deck. Discard 2 cards from a tu hand y quita this card desde el game.

name: Coordinated Effort
text:
Vincula esta carta a an encounter card in play. Max 1 per encounter card.
While paying costs on attached card, any jugador may help pay those costs.

name: Disarming Defense
text: Interrupción de Héroe (defense): cuando a tu hero defends against an attack, recibe +2 DEF for that attack. si you take no de Daño from that attack, discard an attachment sobre attacking enemy with the text "Acción de Héroe" o "Respuesta de Héroe".

name: Avengers Compound
text: Play only if a tu identity has the [[Vengador]] trait. Max 1 per deck. Acción: Exhaust Avengers Compound → choose: tuck 1 ally from a tu hand here if there is no ally tucked here, o play the ally tucked here as if it were in a tu hand.
